accountManagement.permissions.descriptio: Patient personal data: name, ID number, date of birth, contact information, address, citizenship
Medical staff data: doctors, nurses, administrators - their qualifications and contact information
Staff roles and responsibilities: position, department, specialty assignments
Clinical observations and measurements: vital signs, lab results, diagnoses, symptoms
Patient visits: admission date, discharge date, visit type (outpatient/inpatient), attending physician
Medication prescriptions: dosage, administration route, duration, refills allowed
Diagnostic study reports: laboratory, radiology, pathology results and conclusions
Insurance policies: insurance company, policy number, validity period, copay terms
Insurance claims: payment requests to insurance companies, service costs
Invoices and bills: service costs, payment status, outstanding balances
Access policies: role permissions in the system, security rules
Form templates: medical forms, questionnaires, survey templates
Completed forms: answers submitted by patients or staff
Documents and files: uploaded files, PDF documents, scanned materials
Medical services catalog: procedures, consultations, studies - codes and prices
Specimen types: blood, urine, swab - laboratory sample classification
Lab test components: analysis parameters, normal ranges, units of measurement
Medical devices and containers: laboratory tubes, equipment
Audit log: history of system actions - who did what and when

form100.field1.label: Name of the institution issuing the certificate and/or doctor specialist's surname, name, specialty assigned by state certificate. State certificate number and/or contact information

form100.field2b.label: To be presented
form100.field3.label: Patient's first name and surname

form100.field5.note: Filled for persons 16 years and older

form100.field8b.label: b) Sent to hospital
form100.field8c.label: c) Placed in hospital
form100.field8d.label: d) Discharge
form100.field9.label: Conclusion about health status or full diagnosis (main disease, accompanying diseases, complications)
form100.field10.label: Past diseases
form100.field11.label: Brief anamnesis
form100.field12.label: Conducted diagnostic examinations and consultations
form100.field13.label: Course of illness
form100.field14.label: Treatment provided

form100.field17.label: Treatment and work recommendations
